timeline.body: Why did you stop using `PERSPECTIVE_PARAM` here?

replies.bodyText: I was working to replace perspective param to use dashboard instead, however, I changed to support both params, but I forgot to replace in some parts!
replies.author: jesuino

timeline.body: Looks like this import can be removed.

timeline.author: caponetto

replies.bodyText:
I also changed this class to use the helper I created later.
This code is very old, it was a small unplanned feature that waited until main features were implemented to be added. When I first created this button there was no helper or multi mode, hence I had to change!
replies.author: jesuino
